channel.title: 2 computers 1 client 1 server. help
channel.description: Sup. im trying to run a server on one computer (This one is a pice of crap so idc about leaving it on. if you see where im goin with this..) and the clien ton the other. problem is it wont connect. i have a no ip running on the computer with the server. the one with the client wont frekin connect. i changed the ip in the gui...still nothing. any ideas?

item.title: 2 computers 1 client 1 server. help
item.dc:creator: @jaloko jaloko
item.description:
@jaloko wrote:

kk ill see if that works.

nop still dosent frekin work =.=

item.title: 2 computers 1 client 1 server. help
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

If both computers are on the same network, the address you would have to use is the host computers IPv4 address.

Read full topic
